column1: Little Goat Diner////If you love fried chicken
column2: you know there is nothing better than the crispiness of fried chicken right out of the fryer / oven. By extension
column3: there is nothing more tragic than the sogginess of fried chicken that has been sitting for just a bit too long. And for someone who loves the savory / sweet contrast
column4: I found that the dish did not have enough of either.
